email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Steel Coils - Port of Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear David,

I hope this message finds you well. We are looking to transport 12,000 MT of steel coils from the Port of Rotterdam to Shanghai on CIF terms. Could you provide a freight quote and confirm vessel availability for a laycan of 25-30 October?

Best regards,
Emily Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Steel Coils - Port of Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel OCEAN MASTER, DWT 150,000, LOA 280m, for your shipment. The starting freight rate is USD 45 per MT. Laycan is confirmed for 25-30 October. Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
David Wilson

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Steel Coils - Port of Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear David,

Thank you for the quick response. USD 45 per MT seems a bit high. Could you consider USD 42 per MT? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate and loading window?

Best regards,
Emily Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Steel Coils - Port of Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I can offer USD 43 per MT, considering the current market conditions. The demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day, pro rata, with a loading window of 48 hours. Please confirm if this is acceptable.

Best regards,
David Wilson

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Steel Coils - Port of Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear David,

USD 43 per MT is acceptable. Please proceed with the booking for the OCEAN MASTER with a laycan of 25-30 October. Could you send over the charter party for review?

Best regards,
Emily Carter

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Charter Party for OCEAN MASTER
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

Attached is the charter party for your review. Please let me know if any adjustments are needed.

Best regards,
David Wilson

email_chain.subject: Re: Fwd: Charter Party for OCEAN MASTER
email_chain.body:
Dear David,

The charter party looks good. We will proceed as discussed. Thank you for your assistance.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
